descriptionHtml:
I made these because all the helmets look horrible for an assassin or theif, both the dragonscale and leather hoods look exactly alike but are armored like the leather and dragonscale helmets  also you can wear circlets under the hood to max out enchantments. To get them just craft at the forge (you still need the dragon smith perk to craft the dragonscale hood)

 labeled as hoodleather and hooddragon in the creation kit if you want to modify the attributes
author: Wolf173
